contract_details.description: Implement unified configuration management system to eliminate duplicate configurations, ensure consistency across environments, and provide centralized configuration governance for the entire swarm.
contract_details.background: Configuration duplication across multiple environments and services has created maintenance challenges, inconsistent behavior, and increased risk of configuration drift throughout the swarm infrastructure.
objectives: Audit all configuration files and identify duplication patterns
Create unified configuration schema and eliminate redundant settings
Establish configuration validation and consistency checking
Implement automated configuration deployment and rollback
deliverables: Configuration duplication analysis report with consolidation recommendations
Unified configuration management system with centralized control
Configuration schema definitions and validation rules
Automated configuration deployment and validation system
Configuration monitoring dashboard with drift detection
technical_requirements: Configuration validation frameworks (JSON Schema, YAML validation)
Version control systems for configuration management
CI/CD pipelines with configuration deployment capabilities
Monitoring and alerting systems for configuration changes
success_criteria: Configuration duplication reduced by 80%+ across all systems
Configuration validation catching 100% of invalid changes
Environment consistency maintained across all deployments
Automated deployment reducing manual configuration by 90%
Configuration drift detected and corrected in real-time

dependencies: Version control system for configuration management established
CI/CD pipeline with configuration deployment capabilities ready
resources_required: Version control systems and branching strategies

network_unlocks: Access to Configuration Management Working Group

contract_history.details: Configuration deduplication contract template created for unified configuration management and environment consistency
